database - package database
 
Database - Class in database
This class contains all of the MYSQL statements that is used for the whole program, from login to gameplay.
Database() - Constructor for class database.Database
Initializes the connection pool on creation of a Database object
databaseNoTimeout() - Method in class menus.Main
Runs in the background while the program is open, and executes an select statement after a set amount of time to keep the database from timing out.
